scripts.buildsrc: npm run buildver && cat src/version.js src/image.js src/sound.js src/param.js src/touch.js > ./pico.js
scripts.buildsub: if [ -n "${npm_config_main}" ] && [ -n  "${npm_config_sub}" ]; then mkdir -p ../${npm_config_main}/app && cp app/${npm_config_sub}.js ../${npm_config_main}/app/${npm_config_sub}.js; fi
scripts.buildsubs: subs=(${npm_config_sub//,/ }) && for sub in "${subs[@]}"; do npm run buildsub --main=${npm_config_main} --sub=$sub; done;
scripts.buildapp: if [ -n "${npm_config_main}" ]; then mkdir -p ../${npm_config_main} && cp pico.* ../${npm_config_main} && cp index.* ../${npm_config_main} && cp app/${npm_config_main}.js ../${npm_config_main}/app.js && cp app/${npm_config_main}.json ../${npm_config_main}/app.json; fi
scripts.build: npm run buildsrc && npm run buildapp --main=${npm_config_main} && npm run buildsubs --sub=${npm_config_sub}
scripts.cleansubs: subs=(${npm_config_sub//,/ }); for sub in "${subs[@]}"; do npm run cleansub --main=${npm_config_main} --sub=$sub; done;
scripts.cleanapp: if [ -n "${npm_config_main}" ]; then rm ../${npm_config_main}/pico.*; rm ../${npm_config_main}/index.*; rm ../${npm_config_main}/app.js; rm ../${npm_config_main}/app.json; rmdir ../${npm_config_main}; fi
scripts.clean: npm run cleansubs --sub=${npm_config_sub}; npm run cleanapp --main=${npm_config_main}
